item.title: テストによると、ChatGPTは一部の引用でURLを幻覚しており、OpenAIのライセンス契約を結んでいる少なくとも10のニュース出版物のリンク切れにユーザーを誘導している（Andrew Deck/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Andrew Deck / Nieman Lab:
Tests show that ChatGPT is hallucinating URLs in some citations, directing users to broken links for at least 10 news publications with OpenAI licensing deals  —  Nieman Lab's tests show ChatGPT is directing users to broken URLs for at least 10 publications with OpenAI licensing deals.

item.title: アマゾンは、AI検索スタートアップのパープレクシティが、それを阻止しようとしたウェブサイトをスクレイピングしてAWSの規則に違反しているかどうかを調査している（Wired）。
item.description:
Wired:
Amazon is investigating Perplexity over whether the AI search startup is violating AWS rules by scraping websites that attempted to prevent it from doing so  —  AWS hosted a server linked to the Bezos family- and Nvidia-backed search startup that appears to have been used to scrape the sites …

item.title: ネイバー傘下のウェブトゥーンは、3億1500万ドルの新規株式公開（IPO）後、ナスダック市場で9.5％高の23ドルで取引を終え、時価総額は29億ドルに達した（ブルームバーグ）。
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Naver-owned Webtoon shares closed up 9.5% at $23 in the online comics company's Nasdaq debut, giving it a market value of ~$2.9B, after an IPO that raised $315M  —  - Online comics company's first-time share sale priced at top  — Firm sees growth beyond Korea coming from Japan, France

item.title: ロサンゼルスの陪審団がサンデーチケット独占禁止法裁判でNFLに不利な判決を下し、リーグは加入者に47億ドル以上、バーやレストランに9600万ドルの支払い義務があると述べた（マーガレット・フレミング／フロントオフィス・スポーツ）
item.description:
Margaret Fleming / Front Office Sports:
A Los Angeles jury sides against the NFL in a Sunday Ticket antitrust trial, saying the league owes $4.7B+ to subscribers and $96M to bars and restaurants  —  A jury in Los Angeles sided against the NFL on Thursday in the Sunday Ticket trial that could cost the league billions.

item.title: CNN、討論会へのアクセスについてWHCAに反論：プリントプールの記者は最初の広告ブレイクでスタジオにアクセス、カメラマンの厳しいプールはフルアクセス（Max Tani/@maxwelltani）
item.description:
Max Tani / @maxwelltani:
CNN responds to the WHCA on debate access: the print pool reporter gets studio access at the first ad break, and a tight pool of photographers gets full access  —  In a statement, CNN responded to concerns from the WHCA on press access to the debate room. The network says the “debate is being held without an audience in a CNN studio and is closed to press.” [image]

item.title: CNNに対し、今夜の討論会に黒人メディアを参加させるよう要請。
item.description:
@cbcpac:
The head of the Congressional Black Caucus PAC calls on CNN to give credentials to Black-owned media outlets for tonight's debate; none were credentialed so far  —  Full statement from @RepGregoryMeeks: [image]

item.title: WHCAは、CNNが今夜の大統領討論会でホワイトハウスのトラベルプールをスタジオに入れるよう再三の要請を拒否したことを「深く懸念している」と述べた（Ben Mullin/@benmullin）
item.description:
Ben Mullin / @benmullin:
The WHCA says it is “deeply concerned” that CNN blocked repeated requests to let the White House travel pool in studio for tonight's presidential debate  —  scoop: The White House Correspondents' Association says it's “deeply concerned” that CNN “has rejected our repeated requests to include the White House travel pool inside the studio.” The full statement: [image]

item.title: コムキャストがスポーツに特化したFuboアプリをXfinity Flex、Xumo TV、Xumo Streamの対応ボックスに追加（Matthew Keys/The Desk）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Comcast is adding the sports-focused Fubo app to supported Xfinity Flex, Xumo TV, and Xumo Stream boxes  —  Customers of Comcast's broadband product Xfinity Internet now have access to sports-centric streaming service Fubo on the company's lased streaming boxes.

item.title: Mother Jones』や『Reveal』を制作するCenter for Investigative Reportingは、ChatGPTメーカーのOpenAIとマイクロソフトを、OpenAIが著作権を侵害しているとして提訴した（AP通信）。
item.description:
Associated Press:
The Center for Investigative Reporting, which produces Mother Jones and Reveal, has sued ChatGPT maker OpenAI and Microsoft, saying OpenAI violated copyrights  —  The Center for Investigative Reporting said Thursday it has sued ChatGPT maker OpenAI and its closest business partner, Microsoft …

item.title: 報道の自由財団を含む7つの非営利団体が、バイトダンス社にTikTokの販売を強制するか禁止に直面させる米国の法律は違憲であるとする準備書面を提出（Haleluya Hadero/Associated Press）

Haleluya Hadero / Associated Press:
Seven nonprofits including the Freedom of the Press Foundation file a brief saying the US law forcing ByteDance to sell TikTok or face a ban is unconstitutional  —  A group of nonprofits argued in a legal filing that the federal law requiring TikTok's parent company to sell the platform …

item.title: シカゴ・パブリック・メディア、9月3日から新CEOにVox共同設立者のメリッサ・ベルを指名 CPMはシカゴ・サンタイムズと公共ラジオ局WBEZを所有（David Roeder/Chicago Sun Times）
item.description:
David Roeder / Chicago Sun Times:
Chicago Public Media names Vox co-founder Melissa Bell as its new CEO, starting September 3; CPM owns the Chicago Sun-Times and public radio station WBEZ  —  The founder and former publisher of Vox Media will take over in September.  —  Melissa Bell, former publisher of Vox Media …

item.title: マイクロソフト、AmazonのFire TV StickでXbox TVアプリを7月に25カ国以上で開始予定、Game Pass Ultimate加入者はXbox Cloud Gamingにアクセス可能（Tom Warren/The Verge）
item.description:
Tom Warren / The Verge:
Microsoft plans to launch its Xbox TV app on Amazon's Fire TV Sticks in July in 25+ countries, letting Game Pass Ultimate subscribers access Xbox Cloud Gaming  —  The Xbox app will provide access to Xbox Cloud Gaming so subscribers to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate can stream a variety of games directly to Fire TV devices.

item.title: TimeがOpenAIと複数年のコンテンツ・ライセンス契約を締結、TimeはOpenAIの技術やツールを利用して新製品を開発する（Sara Fischer/Axios）

Sara Fischer / Axios:
Time strikes a multi-year content licensing deal with OpenAI; Time will gain access to OpenAI's tech and tools to develop new products  —  - It also gives the AI giant access to Time's real-time content to help answer user queries as news unfolds.  — Under the agreement …

Sewell Chan, EIC of The Texas Tribune, is named executive editor of CJR; Tribune managing editor Matthew Watkins will become EIC when Chan departs in September  —  He joins after leading The Texas Tribune for three years.  —  Sewell Chan, the editor in chief of The Texas Tribune …

A look at WaPo's leadership issues under Jeff Bezos, as his hands-off approach and selection of publishers left the paper without a long-term strategy  —  How the world's greatest businessman drove his newspaper into a ditch  —  If you want to understand the current crisis at The Washington Post …
